about_the_game:
Add 31 Hame Oppai Waifus to Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer; in all their natural glory!

31 new sliding puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of your Waifus in the gallery!

Add these new spicy Summer Waifus to your collection now with Eroi Waifus Part 2!

content_descriptors.notes: This features Summer Waifus completely nude! There is no sexual acts, just beautiful nude Waifus!

  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 116 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
